required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation Of The Relative Bioavailability Of PF-04457845 Tablet To Solution Formulation And Food Effect In Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open-Label, Single Dose, Crossover Study To Evaluate The Relative Bioavailability Of PF-04457845 Tablet To Solution Formulation And To Assess Food Effect In Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to estimate the bioavailability of PF-04457845 tablets relative to solution and evaluate the effect of food (fasted vs. high fat meal) on the pharmacokinetics of an oral tablet formulation of PF-04457845

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety and toleration including adverse events, vital signs measurements, 12-lead ECGs, Physical examination findings, Blood and urine safety tests.

arm_group.description: Standard Phase 1 normal healthy adult volunteers, age range 21-55 years and of either sex

intervention.description: Single dose, 8 mg as oral tablet and solution formulation

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.
